title: shrI rAmAbhirAmA
sahitya:
shrI rAmAbhirAmA nAdu cittambu nI pAda pankajabupai sadAyuniciti


caraNam 1    nEramula nencaku karuNa galigi nanugA mulacE balimigAda yAnvita paTTiy Adarincumi ika
    caraNam 2    ninu vinA nanu krtArthunika jEyuTaku nI jagatilO nevarura nrpavara
    caraNam 3    muninuta danuja vidAraNa sura hita shubha vIkSaNAbhaya hasta
    caraNam 4    shrI sItA vihAra catura sadAshivArtti bhanjanA sarOja nayana
madana janaka paTutara suvacana dasharatha suta sadaya hrdaya vidhi haranta
